text.text: # Lunch and Learn - Python Data Processing :computer:

Being held in the Burton Office, *Room 1.A, July 7th 12:30-13:00*. Interactive hands on demonstration of how we built data processing pipelines using the Python Luigi library.
 - July 7th 12:30 - 13:00 - <@U123>, <@U932>, <@U932>, <@U932>, <@U932>, <@U932>, <@U932>, <@U932>
